202.description: The request is being processed. See [Handling 202's](https://runbuggy.docs.stoplight.io/guides/202-responses).

post.description: Create an Order to transfer vehicles.

202.description: Request has been accepted and is being processed.

post.description: Cancel specified Order. If vehicles have shipped you may no longer cancel Order. 202 status code indicates the Cancelation request has been accepted and is processing. Check the Order resource for the status to change to "CANCELED".
Cancels the original and creates a new one. To track the status, see the Order.replacement property of the order being replaced.

get.description: Retrieve an Order expanded with full Vehicle Transfer Orders.
Search expanded orders using RSQL. For example: orders/full?query=created.date>2020-10-15T00:00:00Z;created.date<2020-10-21T00:00:00Z
List an Order's the Vehicle Transfer Orders.
Retrieve a paginated Vehicle Transfer Orders.
Retrieve paginated expanded Vehicle Transfer Orders.
